name: Vampire Springbreak
description:
Help Dracula pack all his stuff before he is late to his long awaited vacation! Gather everything you need, but be careful! If you pack too much stuff your bag might be overweight! 

This game was created for the Quarantine Jam hosted by the LebGameDev.

Our development team is formed by: 

@AliceBearmaid @orchid-tea @rsofia @luisquid
